head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BARBIERI, JOSEPH J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BARBIERI, JOSEPH J.

block.p: BARBIERI-Joseph J., 80, died September 27, 2000. Husband of Ellen. Father of June Hesler, Mary Jane Connor, Joanne Barbieri, John Barbieri and Catherine Jelinek. Nine grandchildren. Retired 1981 after a 35-year career as Treasurer with the Mamaroneck Board of Education. Graduate Fordham College School of Business 1941. Member of American Legion and Mamaroneck Old Timers Club. Reposing at Fox Funeral Home, Larchmont, NY, Friday, 2-4 PM, 79 PM. Mass St. Augustine's Church, Larchmont, New York, Saturday, 10 AM. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to Rosary Hill, Hawthorne, New York, Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, or the charity of your choice.
